Ardi Warsidi (born 22 August 1979) is an Indonesian former footballer who plays as a defender.
Honours
Arema Malang
*Liga Indonesia First Division: 2004
*Copa Indonesia: 2005, 2006
Indonesia
*AFF Championship runner-up: 2000
